mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(c.pid,c.description) as modulstr FROM m_roles a JOIN m_role_modules b ON a.role_id=b.role_id LEFT JOIN m_modules c ON b.module_id=c.id WHERE a.role_id=#{id}

SELECT role_id as roleId, role_name as roleName FROM m_roles where is_delete = 0
and role_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleId},'%') )
and role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleName},'%') )
